name: Ch.7BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Seth;It looks like we'll be resting here for a bit.|The troops have been working hard lately.
speak;Eirika;That they have!|I should go and see if they are holding up...
speak;Seth;Wait a moment, Princess.|Are you sure you haven't been pushing yourself too hard?
speak;Eirika;I'm okay, Seth, I just want to do what I can for everyone.|We can't afford to lose...
speak;Seth;Do you doubt yourself, my Lord?
speak;Eirika;Everything just happened so fast.|I don't know what to think anymore...
speak;Seth;Princess, draw your sword.|I'm going to help you improve your swordmanship.
speak;Seth;I can't stop you from doubting many things, but I can help you not doubt your own blade.|Draw it, and we'll spar.
alert;Eirika gained some WEXP in swords!
